Constructor Detail

GUI

public GUI(Repository repository)
Use this constructor to create all neccessary GUI-classes.

Method Detail

showMainApplicationGUI

public void showMainApplicationGUI(java.lang.String title)
By calling this method, all GUI-objects needed for displaying the ASCML as an application are instantiated, initialized and brought on the user's screen. When the ASCML should (also) be shown as an applet, please call the showAppletGUI()-method.

Parameters:
title - the title for the frame

showAppletGUI

public void showAppletGUI()
By calling this method, all GUI-objects needed for displaying the ASCML as an applet are instantiated, initialized and showed on the user's screen. When the ASCML should (also) be shown as an application, please call the showApplicationGUI()-method.

exceptionThrown

public void exceptionThrown(ExceptionEvent event)
Specified by:
exceptionThrown in interface ExceptionListener

exit

public void exit()
Call this method before the ASCML is going to shut down. This method will dispose the GUI-objects and remove them from the user's screen.

windowClosing

public void windowClosing(java.awt.event.WindowEvent e)
Called, when user presses the x on the top-right edge of the frame in order to close the ascml

Specified by:
windowClosing in interface java.awt.event.WindowListener
Overrides:
windowClosing in class java.awt.event.WindowAdapter
Parameters:
e -
